text:
Since I was a little girl, my dream is to have a job with children.
When I was young my godmother was 18 and she was at the same place as me today but not at Rennes. I was so proud of her when after a long years of study she was teacher. Her first job was at my school so when I was in last year at school she was my teacher. She is not a sweet teacher, all the children are afraid of her but she is one of the best teacher I ever know and I'm not the only people to think that. When the holidays arrived I passed all my time with her to help her to prepare her class for the following year. She is an exemple for me, as a godmother which lead you on the way to god she led me on the way to discover my dream future.
Back to school 2020, my mother change her job, she stoped taking care of old people, she prefer taking care of children so she became teacher assistant with the 2-6 years she loves her new job and I love listen her when she talk about her day, sometime I came at school with her and I love that, I love the children and they love me back.
Winter 2021, I have to go to high school only twice a week because of the Covid-19 so when I'm not at high school I'm at school with my mother and I love that, I work with her 7 month two days a week it was my best experience. Now I'm sure that when I'll be older I'll be a teacher.
